title: Aural set, Rhenish - opening melodic motive

content.question: The pitches of the opening melodic motive are best notated as

choices.label: Bass clef melody in three-four. Eighth note G2 pickup. Eighth notes C3, D3, dotted eighth E3, sixteenth F3, eighth E3.
Bass clef melody in three-four. Eighth note G2 pickup. Eighth notes C3, E3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth A3, eighth G3.
Bass clef melody in three-four. Eighth note C3 pickup. Eighth notes E3, F3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth A3, eighth G3.
Bass clef melody in three-four. Eighth note C3 pickup. Eighth notes E3, G3, dotted eighth C4, sixteenth D4, eighth C4.

content.answer: Bass clef melody in three-four. Eighth note G2 pickup. Eighth notes C3, E3, dotted eighth G3, sixteenth A3, eighth G3.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Use symbols and terms to describe melodic, harmonic, and rhythmic relationships in performed music. (This skill is applied in describing these elements in a full musical context.)
